group.name: Main examples page.
group.note: The MIDI block currently gives you a component to generate an XML representation from any MIDI file (called XMidi by its author Peter Loeb). In due course I will add a MIDI serializer and some transformers to generate SVG visualisations of the XMidi, starting with normal western musical notation. For fun, I shall also create some transformers to perform basic musical manipulations such as inversion and retrograde.
